There is a problem with this episode and the 10th episode, I think it's related to old enocder header compression, but it crashs multiple times within the episode...not the first time i face such issues with mkv releases from EZTV... i appreciate the hard word you guiys are doing but the mkv files you upload nearly everytime has a problem  and doesn't work properly
